misc.restricted: You dont have the rights for this command!
misc.wrongcommand: Invalid command type !help for list of commands
misc.pugtimewarn: Your added games will expire in 20 minutes, type !renew to renew your games

cmds.register: Connect your account with your XonStats (stats.xonotic.org): !register <xonstats-id>
cmds.pickups: Shows all possible gametypes available for pickupgames: !pickups
cmds.add: Add to all current pickup games or specific games: !add [<gametype>]
cmds.remove: Remove from all pickup games or specific games: !remove [<gametype>]
cmds.server: Show all available Xonotic servers or specific server and their IP: !server <servername>
cmds.pull: remove specific player from pickup games: !pull [<players>]
cmds.who: List all current pickup games with players
cmds.online: List all current online discord-members for irc-users and vice versa
cmds.kill: Command for marking users with xonotic flavour
cmds.subscribe: Add to subscription to a specific gametype to get notified in !promote command: !subscribe [<gametype>]
cmds.unsubscribe: Remove from all gametype subscriptions or specific gametype subscription: !unsubscribe [<gametype>]
cmds.promote: Notify all players to gametype specific pickupgame: !promote [<gametype>]
cmds.lastgame: Show the last played pickupgame with date and players: !lastgame
cmds.quote: Get random quote from quoteDB or with playername from specific player: !quote <playername>
cmds.serverinfo: Get infos from server like name, map, player, gametype: !serverinfo <servername>
cmds.start: Force the start of a pickup game that doesn't have all the players yet: !start <gametype>
